00063 class FactorGraph {
00064     public:
00066         BipartiteGraph                    G;
00067 
00069         typedef BipartiteGraph::Neighbor  Neighbor;
00070 
00072         typedef BipartiteGraph::Neighbors Neighbors;
00073 
00075         typedef BipartiteGraph::Edge      Edge;
00076 
00077     private:
00078         std::vector<Var>         _vars;
00079         std::vector<Factor>      _factors;
00080         std::map<size_t,Factor>  _backup;
00081 
00082     public:
00084         FactorGraph() : G(), _vars(), _factors(), _backup() {}
00085 
00087         FactorGraph(const FactorGraph & x) : G(x.G), _vars(x._vars), _factors(x._factors), _backup(x._backup) {}
00088 
00090         FactorGraph & operator=(const FactorGraph & x) {
00091             if( this != &x ) {
00092                 G          = x.G;
00093                 _vars      = x._vars;
00094                 _factors   = x._factors;
00095                 _backup    = x._backup;
00096             }
00097             return *this;
00098         }
00099 
00101         FactorGraph(const std::vector<Factor> &P);
00102 
00104 
00108         template<typename FactorInputIterator, typename VarInputIterator>
00109         FactorGraph(FactorInputIterator fact_begin, FactorInputIterator fact_end, VarInputIterator var_begin, VarInputIterator var_end, size_t nr_fact_hint = 0, size_t nr_var_hint = 0 );
00110 
00112         virtual ~FactorGraph() {}
00113 
00115         virtual FactorGraph* clone() const { return new FactorGraph(); }
00116 
00118         virtual FactorGraph* create() const { return new FactorGraph(*this); }
00119 
00121         const Var & var(size_t i) const { return _vars[i]; }
00123         const std::vector<Var> & vars() const { return _vars; }
00125         Factor & factor(size_t I) { return _factors[I]; }
00127         const Factor & factor(size_t I) const { return _factors[I]; }
00129         const std::vector<Factor> & factors() const { return _factors; }
00130 
00132         size_t nrVars() const { return vars().size(); }
00134         size_t nrFactors() const { return factors().size(); }
00136         size_t nrEdges() const { return G.nrEdges(); }
00137 
00139         const Neighbors & nbV( size_t i ) const { return G.nb1(i); }
00141         Neighbors & nbV( size_t i ) { return G.nb1(i); }
00143         const Neighbors & nbF( size_t I ) const { return G.nb2(I); }
00145         Neighbors & nbF( size_t I ) { return G.nb2(I); }
00147         const Neighbor & nbV( size_t i, size_t _I ) const { return G.nb1(i)[_I]; }
00149         Neighbor & nbV( size_t i, size_t _I ) { return G.nb1(i)[_I]; }
00151         const Neighbor & nbF( size_t I, size_t _i ) const { return G.nb2(I)[_i]; }
00153         Neighbor & nbF( size_t I, size_t _i ) { return G.nb2(I)[_i]; }
00154 
00156         size_t findVar( const Var & n ) const {
00157             size_t i = find( vars().begin(), vars().end(), n ) - vars().begin();
00158             assert( i != nrVars() );
00159             return i;
00160         }
00161 
00163         std::set<size_t> findVars( VarSet &ns ) const {
00164             std::set<size_t> indexes;
00165             for( VarSet::const_iterator n = ns.begin(); n != ns.end(); n++ )
00166                 indexes.insert( findVar( *n ) );
00167             return indexes;
00168         }
00169 
00171         size_t findFactor(const VarSet &ns) const {
00172             size_t I;
00173             for( I = 0; I < nrFactors(); I++ )
00174                 if( factor(I).vars() == ns )
00175                     break;
00176             assert( I != nrFactors() );
00177             return I;
00178         }
00179 
00181         VarSet Delta( unsigned i ) const;
00182 
00184         VarSet Delta( const VarSet &ns ) const;
00185 
00187         VarSet delta( unsigned i ) const;
00188 
00190         VarSet delta( const VarSet & ns ) const {
00191             return Delta( ns ) / ns;
00192         }
00193 
00195         virtual void setFactor( size_t I, const Factor &newFactor, bool backup = false ) {
00196             assert( newFactor.vars() == factor(I).vars() ); 
00197             if( backup )
00198                 backupFactor( I );
00199             _factors[I] = newFactor; 
00200         }
00201 
00203         virtual void setFactors( const std::map<size_t, Factor> & facs, bool backup = false ) {
00204             for( std::map<size_t, Factor>::const_iterator fac = facs.begin(); fac != facs.end(); fac++ ) {
00205                 if( backup )
00206                     backupFactor( fac->first );
00207                 setFactor( fac->first, fac->second );
00208             }
00209         }
00210 
00213         virtual void clamp( const Var & n, size_t i, bool backup = false );
00214 
00216         virtual void makeCavity( unsigned i, bool backup = false );
00217 
00219         virtual void backupFactors( const std::set<size_t> & facs );
00220 
00222         virtual void restoreFactors();
00223 
00225         bool isConnected() const { return G.isConnected(); }
00226 
00228         bool isTree() const { return G.isTree(); }
00229 
00231         bool isPairwise() const;
00232 
00234         bool isBinary() const;

00264         void backupFactors( const VarSet &ns );
00266         void restoreFactors( const VarSet &ns );

00272     private:
00274         void constructGraph( size_t nrEdges );
00275 };
00276 
00277 
00278 template<typename FactorInputIterator, typename VarInputIterator>
00279 FactorGraph::FactorGraph(FactorInputIterator fact_begin, FactorInputIterator fact_end, VarInputIterator var_begin, VarInputIterator var_end, size_t nr_fact_hint, size_t nr_var_hint ) : G(), _backup() {
00280     // add factors
00281     size_t nrEdges = 0;
00282     _factors.reserve( nr_fact_hint );
00283     for( FactorInputIterator p2 = fact_begin; p2 != fact_end; ++p2 ) {
00284         _factors.push_back( *p2 );
00285         nrEdges += p2->vars().size();
00286     }
00287 
00288     // add variables
00289     _vars.reserve( nr_var_hint );
00290     for( VarInputIterator p1 = var_begin; p1 != var_end; ++p1 )
00291         _vars.push_back( *p1 );
00292 
00293     // create graph structure
00294     constructGraph( nrEdges );
00295 }
